heading: Steadfast Barracks Dungeon Guide
content: Steadfast Barracks does not contain any dangerous monsters and has a fairly compact, open layout. It is solid for farming, but is not currently a possible . The Mother's Judgement is an simple boss with a strong lightning attack you should avoid. This dungeon unlocks the , a powerful defensive aspect for a Werewolf Druid. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
